# Methods

## Validation with synthetic data set

- Full ITS sequences amplified from mycelia or spores of 60 fungal strains
- PCR primers: ITS_NS5(F)/ITS_LR6(R)
- Nanopore MinION R10.4 chemistry
- Kit SQK-NBD114.96
- Guppy super-high accuracy dna_r10.4.1_e8.2_400bps_sup
- [alt] Dorado: dna_r10.4.1_e8.2_400bps_sup@v4.1.0

### Synthetic scenarios

- Even distribution
  - 60 samples - subsampled to meet library sizes: 1200, 3000, 10020, 60000, 120000, 150000. 20, 50, 167, 1000, 2000, 2500 reads per sample.
